steps: Mix graham cracker crumbs with melted butter and press into the base of a dish to form the crust
In a bowl, beat cream cheese, sugar, and vanilla extract until smooth
In another bowl, whip the heavy cream until stiff peaks form and fold it into the cream cheese mixture
Pour the filling over the crust and smooth it out
Refrigerate for at least 4 hours or overnight before serving
Melt the dark chocolate in a heatproof bowl over a pot of simmering water
Whip the heavy cream with sugar and vanilla extract until stiff peaks form
Allow the melted chocolate to cool slightly, then fold it into the whipped cream
Spoon the mousse into serving dishes and refrigerate for at least 2 hours before serving
